(Damn you, Yan.  It's T-E-U-F-E-L!  Spell it right or I'll kill you!)

Unicron/Teufel:
 


Unicron watched Vehement out of the corner of his optic, as well as his 
sacirifice.  That was sufficient punishment for his lack to bring the two 
other Neo 'Cons online.  
/FALL BACK/ his voice roared over the battlefield.  In fact, most of them 
(most of my chars) were already moving back, and were almost out of firing 
range of the CF and vice versa.

The shots from Hot Rod struck and Unicron shook, slight pain building up but 
not even close to enough to make him show pain.  He raised an arm, firing off 
two missiles down at Hot Rod.

---

Teufel raised his arms and fired two missiles to intercept the others.  His 
shoulder cannons then fired twenty shots from each, forty shots blasting 
through the debris, though some shots were deflected by shrapnel bits, the 
rest heading for Zardus.
